site.title: Toolneat - Online Utility Tools
site.description: Free online tools for developers and everyday life.

home.title: Online Utility Tools
home.subtitle: Tools for developers and everyday life.
home.devToolsDesc: Encoding, conversion, and generation tools for developers
home.lifeToolsDesc: Useful calculators and conversion tools for daily life

characterCounter.title: Character Counter
characterCounter.description: Count characters, words, and bytes in your text.
characterCounter.descriptionLong: Useful for writing documents with character limits like blog posts, SNS, and resumes. Check character count (with/without spaces), word count, and bytes (UTF-8) in real-time.

jsonFormatter.title: JSON Formatter
jsonFormatter.description: Format and validate your JSON data.
jsonFormatter.descriptionLong: Auto-format JSON and detect syntax errors. Syntax highlighting makes data structure easy to understand.
jsonFormatter.sizeWarning: Large JSON. Only partial content is displayed for performance.

base64.title: Base64 Encode/Decode
base64.description: Encode or decode text to/from Base64.
base64.descriptionLong: Base64 encodes binary data into ASCII characters. Widely used for email attachments, data URIs, and API tokens. The URL-safe option converts +/= to URL-safe characters.

uuidGenerator.title: UUID Generator
uuidGenerator.descriptionLong: UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) is a globally unique identifier. Widely used for database keys, API tokens, and session IDs. Supports v7 (time-sortable), v4 (random), and v1 (timestamp) versions.

urlEncoder.title: URL Encode/Decode
urlEncoder.inputPlaceholder: Enter URL or text to encode...

salaryCalculator.title: Salary Calculator (Korea)
salaryCalculator.description: Calculate your take-home pay after taxes.
salaryCalculator.descriptionLong: Calculate your monthly take-home pay after taxes and insurance deductions. Based on 2025 Korean tax rates.
salaryCalculator.koreaOnlyWarning: This calculator is based on Korean tax law and is only applicable in Korea.
salaryCalculator.disclaimerDetail: This calculator is for reference only. Actual amounts may vary based on company payroll, non-taxable benefits, and year-end settlement. Check your payslip for exact figures.

ddayCalculator.title: D-day Calculator
ddayCalculator.description: Calculate days until a specific date.
ddayCalculator.descriptionLong: Calculate days until important dates like exams, anniversaries, or trips. You can also calculate the difference between two dates.

unitConverter.title: Unit Converter
unitConverter.descriptionLong: Quickly convert commonly used units. Supports real estate area (pyeong/㎡), length, weight, temperature, and data storage units.

colorConverter.title: Color Converter
colorConverter.description: Convert between HEX, RGB, HSL color formats.
colorConverter.descriptionLong: Convert between various color formats including HEX, RGB, HSL, RGBA, HSLA, and HEX8. Features color picker and related color suggestions.
colorConverter.infoHex: • HEX: Most common format for web (#RRGGBB)
colorConverter.infoHsl: • HSL: Hue, Saturation, Lightness for intuitive color adjustments

hashGenerator.title: Hash Generator
hashGenerator.description: Generate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256 and other hashes.
hashGenerator.descriptionLong: Generate hash values (MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512) for text or files. Used for file integrity verification, password storage, and more.
hashGenerator.dropFile: Drag file here or click to select
hashGenerator.infoMd5: • MD5: 128-bit, fast but not secure (for checksums)

bmiCalculator.title: BMI Calculator
bmiCalculator.descriptionLong: Enter your height and weight to calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI). Check your healthy weight range and obesity level.
bmiCalculator.infoNote1: • BMI doesn't directly measure body fat. Use it as a reference only.
bmiCalculator.infoNote2: • Athletes with high muscle mass may have higher BMI values.
bmiCalculator.infoNote3: • Consult a healthcare professional for accurate health assessment.

qrGenerator.title: QR Code Generator
qrGenerator.description: Generate QR codes from text, URLs, and more.
qrGenerator.descriptionLong: Convert URLs, text, phone numbers, emails, and Wi-Fi information into QR codes. Customize size, error correction level, and colors.
qrGenerator.textPlaceholder: Enter text to convert to QR code
qrGenerator.infoTip1: • Higher error correction levels allow damaged QR codes to still be readable.
qrGenerator.infoTip2: • Ensure sufficient contrast between foreground and background colors for better scanning.
qrGenerator.infoTip3: • Wi-Fi QR codes can be scanned by smartphones to auto-connect.

regexTester.title: Regex Tester
regexTester.descriptionLong: Test regular expressions (RegEx) in real-time and see matching results. Features pattern matching, group capture, and string replacement.
regexTester.replaceModeDesc: Replace matched patterns with another string.
regexTester.replaceHint: Use $1, $2... for capture groups, $& for full match

loanCalculator.title: Loan Calculator
loanCalculator.descriptionLong: Enter loan principal, interest rate, and term to calculate monthly payments, total payment, and total interest. Supports equal payment, equal principal, and bullet payment methods.
loanCalculator.koreaNotice: This calculator is designed for Korean loan products. Taxes and fees may differ in other countries.
loanCalculator.equalPaymentInfo: Pay the same amount (principal + interest) each month. Interest portion is higher initially and decreases over time. Allows for predictable monthly budgeting.
loanCalculator.equalPrincipalInfo: Pay the same principal amount each month plus interest on remaining balance. Higher payments initially that decrease over time. Results in lower total interest than equal payment method.
loanCalculator.bulletInfo: Pay only interest during the loan term and repay the entire principal at maturity. Lowest monthly payment burden but highest total interest.
loanCalculator.scheduleNote: Full schedule can be exported to CSV.
loanCalculator.termTooLong: Loan term is too long (max 50 years).

timestampConverter.title: Unix Timestamp Converter
timestampConverter.description: Convert between Unix timestamps and dates.
timestampConverter.descriptionLong: Convert between Unix timestamps (Epoch Time) and date/time. Supports both seconds and milliseconds.
timestampConverter.info1: Unix Timestamp (or Epoch Time, POSIX Time) is a value representing the number of seconds elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC (Unix Epoch).
timestampConverter.info2: It's a timezone-independent way of representing absolute time, widely used in programming and databases. JavaScript uses milliseconds, while most Unix systems use seconds.
timestampConverter.y2038Desc: On 32-bit systems, Unix Timestamp will overflow on January 19, 2038, at 03:14:07 UTC. Most modern systems use 64-bit to avoid this issue.

jwtDecoder.title: JWT Decoder
jwtDecoder.description: Decode JWT tokens to view their contents.
jwtDecoder.descriptionLong: Decode JWT (JSON Web Token) to view Header, Payload, and Signature. Easily check token expiration time and claim information.
jwtDecoder.signatureNote: Only HMAC algorithms (HS256, HS384, HS512) are supported.

jwtGenerator.title: JWT Generator
jwtGenerator.descriptionLong: Generate JWT (JSON Web Token). Set Header, Payload and sign with a secret key.
jwtGenerator.secretNote: Keep your secret key safe. Never expose it publicly.
jwtGenerator.jsonModeDesc: Enter JSON payload directly. Must be valid JSON format.
jwtGenerator.info1: Header: Algorithm and token type information
jwtGenerator.info3: Signature: Generated from Header + Payload + Secret

loremIpsum.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator
loremIpsum.descriptionLong: Generate Lorem Ipsum placeholder text for design and layout testing. Generate by paragraphs, sentences, or words.
loremIpsum.info1: Lorem Ipsum is standard placeholder text used in the publishing and graphic design industries. It has been used since the 1500s and is widely used for layout and font testing.
loremIpsum.info2: It's used to preview designs before actual content is ready. Since the text is unreadable, readers' attention focuses on the layout rather than the content.

deadPixelTest.title: Dead Pixel Test
deadPixelTest.description: Find dead pixels on your monitor.
deadPixelTest.descriptionLong: Fill your screen with solid colors to detect dead pixels, stuck pixels, or hot pixels. Click a color button below to enter fullscreen mode.

screenBurnTest.title: Screen Burn-In Test
screenBurnTest.description: Check for burn-in on OLED displays.
screenBurnTest.descriptionLong: Check for burn-in on OLED displays. If you see ghost images on gray screen, your display has burn-in.

screenColorTest.title: Screen Color Test
screenColorTest.description: Test your monitor with various colors and patterns.
screenColorTest.descriptionLong: Test your monitor's color uniformity, color accuracy, and banding with various colors and patterns. Click a button below to enter fullscreen mode.

pixelFixer.title: Pixel Fixer
pixelFixer.description: A tool to repair stuck pixels on your monitor.
pixelFixer.descriptionLong: A tool to repair stuck pixels on your monitor. Drag the flashing box over the stuck pixel and run for 10-30 minutes.

imageCompressor.title: Image Compressor
imageCompressor.descriptionLong: Reduce image file size to improve website loading speed and save storage space.
imageCompressor.dropHere: Drag image here or click to select
imageCompressor.info1: • All processing is done in your browser. No data is uploaded to servers.
imageCompressor.info2: • Lower quality values result in smaller file sizes but reduced image quality.
imageCompressor.info3: • PNG uses lossless compression, JPG/WEBP use lossy compression.

barcodeGenerator.title: Barcode Generator
barcodeGenerator.descriptionLong: Generate barcodes in various formats including CODE128, EAN-13, UPC, and more.

baseConverter.title: Number Base Converter
baseConverter.description: Convert between binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal.
baseConverter.descriptionLong: Convert numbers between binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal in real-time.

faviconGenerator.title: Favicon Generator
faviconGenerator.descriptionLong: Upload an image to generate favicons in multiple sizes.
faviconGenerator.dropHere: Drag image here or click to select

asciiUnicode.title: ASCII/Unicode Converter
asciiUnicode.description: Convert between characters and ASCII/Unicode codes.
asciiUnicode.descriptionLong: Convert characters to ASCII/Unicode code points or convert codes to characters.
asciiUnicode.codeHint: Supports decimal (space-separated), hex (0x), unicode (\u), HTML (&#;) formats

emojiPicker.title: Emoji Picker
emojiPicker.descriptionLong: Search for emojis and click to copy automatically.
emojiPicker.info1: • Click an emoji to automatically copy it to clipboard.
emojiPicker.info3: • Recently used emojis are saved in your browser.

roulette.title: Roulette Wheel
roulette.description: Spin the roulette for random selection.

coinFlip.title: Coin Flip
coinFlip.description: Flip a coin for heads or tails.

typingTest.title: Typing Test
typingTest.description: Test your typing speed and accuracy.

htmlEntity.title: HTML Entity Encoder
htmlEntity.description: Encode special characters to HTML entities.

yamlJson.title: YAML ↔ JSON Converter
yamlJson.description: Convert between YAML and JSON formats.

lineEnding.title: Line Ending Converter
lineEnding.description: Convert between CRLF, LF line endings.

diffChecker.title: Text Diff Checker
diffChecker.description: Compare two texts and find differences.

imageResizer.title: Image Resizer
imageResizer.description: Resize images to your desired dimensions.
imageResizer.descriptionLong: Resize images to your desired dimensions. Supports aspect ratio lock, pixel/percent units, and SNS presets.
imageResizer.dropHere: Drag image here or click to select
imageResizer.faqDesc: Image resizing changes the dimensions (resolution) of an image. It's useful for website uploads, social media posts, thumbnail creation, and more.
imageResizer.step1: Drag or click to upload an image
imageResizer.step2: Enter desired size in pixels or percent
imageResizer.privacyNote: All processing is done in your browser. No data is uploaded to servers.

imageConverter.title: Image Format Converter
imageConverter.description: Convert between PNG, JPG, WEBP and other formats.
imageConverter.descriptionLong: Convert between PNG, JPG, WEBP and other image formats. Batch convert multiple files at once.
imageConverter.dropHere: Drag images here or click to select
imageConverter.pngDesc: Supports transparency, lossless. Best for logos, screenshots
imageConverter.jpgDesc: Optimized for photos, small file size. No transparency
imageConverter.webpDesc: Modern format, 30% smaller than PNG/JPG. Recommended for web
imageConverter.gifDesc: 256 colors, animation support. Best for simple graphics
imageConverter.bmpDesc: Uncompressed, large file size. For editing
imageConverter.icoDesc: Windows icon format. Used for favicons
imageConverter.privacyNote: All processing is done in your browser. No data is uploaded to servers.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: Toolneat does not store any personal information on our servers. All tools run locally in your browser, and your data never leaves your device.

section2.title: 2. Cookies and Local Storage
section2.content: We use browser local storage to save your site preferences (dark mode, language settings, etc.). This data is stored only on your device and is not transmitted to our servers.

section3.title: 3. Analytics and Advertising
section3.content: We may use Google Analytics to improve our services and Google AdSense to display advertisements. These services use their own cookies and are subject to their respective privacy policies.

section4.title: 4. Third-Party Services
section4.content: Some tools may use external APIs or libraries to provide functionality. When using such services, their respective privacy policies apply.

section5.title: 5. Contact
section5.content: If you have any questions about privacy, please contact us at the address below.

section1.title: 1. Use of Service
section1.content: Toolneat provides various online tools for free. No registration is required, and anyone can use our services freely.

section2.title: 2. Service Provision
section2.content: This service is provided "as is". We do not guarantee the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of the service. Please verify results for critical tasks.

section3.title: 3. User Responsibility
section3.content: Users must use this service for lawful purposes only. Misuse or illegal use of the service is prohibited.

section4.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
section4.content: Toolneat is not responsible for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services. All results from tool usage are the user's responsibility.

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
section5.content: The design, logo, and content of this site are copyrighted by Toolneat. However, users retain rights to any output generated using our tools.

section6.title: 6. Service Changes
section6.content: Toolneat reserves the right to modify, suspend, or terminate services without prior notice.

section7.title: 7. Terms Changes
section7.content: These terms may be changed as needed, and updated terms become effective upon posting on the site.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.content: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at the address below.

whatIs.title: What is Toolneat?
whatIs.content: Toolneat is a collection of free online tools for developers and general users. We help you simplify complex tasks and speed up everyday work.

features.title: Features
features.free: Completely Free - All tools are free to use
features.privacy: Privacy First - All processing happens in your browser
features.fast: Fast - Instant results without server transfers
features.offline: Offline Support - Works offline after first visit

tools.title: Available Tools
tools.devDesc: JSON Formatter, Base64 Encoder, URL Encoder, Regex Tester, Unix Timestamp Converter, JWT Generator, and more
tools.lifeDesc: QR Code Generator, Unit Converter, Loan Calculator, and more

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For bug reports, feature suggestions, or other inquiries, please feel free to reach out.
